dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 989 IH: To codify Executive Order 11246 titled “Equal Employment Opportunity”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brown (for herself and Mr. Raskin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 11246 titled Equal Employment Opportunity.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order 11246 titled Equal Employment Opportunity
section.text: Executive Order 11246 titled Equal Employment Opportunity, signed on September 24, 1965 (30 Fed. Reg. 12319; relating to nondiscrimination in government employment and in employment by government contractors and subcontractors) shall have the full force and effect of law.
